title: Update Address
description: This endpoint is used to update addresses by its id of a Organization/Account in Oracle Commerce Cloud.

addressId.description: The repository id of the address

isDefaultBillingAddress.description: Marks an address as default billing address. Default value is false. Accepts true or false

country.description: The country of the address. This is a mandatory field.

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number of the address. This is a mandatory field

address2.description: The address2 of the secondary address

city.description: The city of the secondary address. This is a mandatory field.

address1.description: The address1 of the secondary address. This is a mandatory field.

companyName.description: Company name of the secondary address. This is a mandatory field

postalCode.description: Postal Code of the address. This is a mandatory field

state.description: The State of the address. This is a mandatory field

isDefaultShippingAddress.description: Marks an address as default shipping address. Default value is false. Accepts true or false

addressType.description: Address type represents nick name of account if present else repository ID of address item. This is a mandatory field
